text: These are the official results of the Women's Individual Time Trial at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney, Australia. The race was held on Saturday, 30 September 2000 with a race distance of 31.2 km. ==Medallists== {| class="wikitable" |align=center bgcolor=gold| Gold Gold |align=center bgcolor=silver| Silver Silver
